modName: Angelina Jolie Savegame and Optional Follower
summary:
This is my Female Character based on Angelina Jolie the prettiest woman alive <3
She is also available as an Optional Standalone Follower. Give her a try :)
UPDATE: Next Character [color=#FFFF00][B]Xenia the Warrior Princess[/B][/COLOR]
descriptionHtml:
[Center][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120812/3k38y4zi.png[/img][/Center]

[color=#FFFF00]Hello Nexus Members
This is my First Upload and I hope you like it. (I am German, so please excuse possible misspellings)

[b]Description[/b]
It is a Savegame, made for you.
Angelina is a [b]Level 1 Nord[/b] Female and you start directly after the Character Creation.
She is based on the Female Celebrity Angelina Jolie

[Center][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120812/fwrwe9ce.png[/img][/Center]

[b]Progress[/b]
It was hard work, because her Face is so damn hard to import into Skyrim. The result is not a 100% perfect copy of her, but she looks quite well I think.
[b]I disabled all my Mods[/b] except the Hairstyles from Apachii, so [b]you should not get any troubles[/b] loading this Savegame.[/color]

[Center][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120812/fwrwe9ce.png[/img][/Center]

[Center][IMG]http://s1.directupload.net/images/120813/n7nytj26.png[/IMG][/Center]
[color=#80FF40][B]UPDATE: 12.08.2012
I added Angelina as Follower. You can find her in Whiterun in "JORRVASKR"
She is a One-Handed & Shield Warrior and prefers Heavy Armor

UPDATE: 14.08.2012
I edited the Follower Version and fixed some wired Issues. I also changed her Spawnpoint to "JORRVASKR" in Whiterun.[/B][/color]

[Center][color=#FF0000][B]ONLY USE THIS, IF SHE IS NOT IN JORRVASKR!
Ingame open your console via ^ and type help angelina
Then you will see a Item code after NPC_: 32010000 for example.
Type player.placeatme xxxxxxxxx 1 and voila, she appears in front of you.
The xxx stands for the code.[/color]

[img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120814/bbecgjhy.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120812/fwrwe9ce.png[/img][/Center]

[center][color=#FFFF00]Requirements:[/b]
There are 3 Mods you need to get her face.

[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url][/b]
Download [b]ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0[/b] in "Optional Files"

[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url][/b]
Download [b]No makeup just improved textures[/b]

[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30]No More Blocky Faces[/url][/b]
Download [b]No_More_Blocky_Faces-1_50[/b]

[img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120812/fwrwe9ce.png[/img]

[heading][B]Before you watch, this is an older Video and does not show the actual Angelina. Check Screenshots![/B][/heading]
[youtube]jweP8lSmsww[/youtube][/center]

[b]Credits[/b]
I Love Skyrim, and this Community is awesome. It is amazing how many brilliant Mods are out there which makes this game a big big adventure.
This is a small thing I can give for you, the community.

Please endorse this, if you like it.[/color]

[Center][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120812/fwrwe9ce.png[/img][/Center]
author: Joachim Bodemer
